1: <mistake>@//sems</mistake> dpas gsungs so//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du//me mtshams pa yi gdan <mistake>spyor</mistake> <mistake>ba'i //ltolas</mistake> dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//shar las dang po bzung ba <mistake>dang //me/</mistake>
2: <mistake>mtshamsu</mistake> pa yi mgor sbyor ba'i//dbus las tha ma 'gyur bar bya//rlung mtshams <mistake>phyirol</mistake> pa bzung <mistake>nas//mshog</mistake> drag e yig sbyor ba'o//zhes <mistake>pcom</mistake> ldan 'das dpal rdo rje <mistake>'dzan</mistake> pas
3: dbang <mistake>bkur</mistake> ma <mistake>dang//mdzod</mistake> gter ma <mistake>dang/ rgyal</mistake> mtshan mchog ma <mistake>dang//mchod</mistake> <mistake>tshan</mistake> mo zhes bya ba lha mo <mistake>bzhis</mistake> gsungs so//o yig thig le dang ldan pa//i yig me mtshams can ldan
4: pa'i//dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya//yi ge <mistake>ee</mistake> dang mnyam ldan pa'i//byang las dang po yang yin te//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin <mistake>dang//e</mistake> yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i//lho las
5: dbu <mistake>m</mistake> 'gyur bar bya//nub nas tha ma bzung nas su//dbus las <mistake>dbum</mistake> <mistake>pyang</mistake> yin te//sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las tha ma bzung nas su//nub kyi dang po de bzhin te//rtag par
6: a med 'gyur <mistake>ba'o //zhes</mistake> bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas <mistake>gsungsso//o</mistake> yig thig le dang ldan <mistake>par //dbus</mistake> las dbu ma yang yin te//me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i//lho
7: las dbu ma 'gyur bar <mistake>bya//a</mistake> yig me mtshams pa ldan pa'i//dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya//yi ge <mistake>a</mistake> <mistake>dang mnyam</mistake> ldan <mistake>pa'i// byang</mistake> <mistake>khas</mistake> dang po yang yin te//me mtshams pa yi stan
8: ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa//tsheg <mistake>dag</mistake> yi ge <mistake>yi</mistake> dang sbyar//de ni 'gyur bar the tshom med//ces bcom ldan <mistake>'angs</mistake> dpal rdo rje <mistake>sams</mistake> dpas gsungs so//o yig <mistake>thag</mistake>
